description_for_human: Locate general charging stations and Tesla supercharger locations for electric vehicles.
description_for_model: Find Tesla supercharger stations available to both non-Tesla electric vehicles and Tesla EVs for a specific location, including the ability to find general public charging stations from other vendors. Data includes station address, number of chargers at each location, provider/vendor and other relevant information, as well as a link to a page that has additional information. The charging data can be used to provide users with up-to-date and accurate information based on various query parameters like city, state/province, country, connector type, vendor and region (continent).
